events.name: The Role of Kx in Machine Learning
events.description: • What we'll doHi, Analytics At Speed Singapore Community, We're holding our next Meetup on Tuesday, 10th April - we hope you can join! Date: Tuesday, 10th AprilTime: 6:30 PM - 10:00 PM Speaker: Sergey Vidyuk, Principal Developer and member of the Kx Development Team Title of talk: The Role of Kx in Machine Learning RSVP here: https://www.meetup.com/kx-singapore/ We are pleased to announce that Sergey Vidyuk, principal developer and member of the Kx Development team, will be in town and will provide an update on how Kx technology is the perfect fit for Machine Learning across verticals. Prior to joining Kx, Sergey was the CTO at Saxo Bank in London and has been a client of Kx for many years in various buy and sell side financial institutions. The talk is a perfect opportunity to learn about the power and scalability of Kx, and how it is being used to address real-life business problems, from the health sector to manufacturing, telco, finance, robotics, and aerospace. Agenda:6:30 - 7:30pm: Networking, Food and Beverages7:30 - 8:30pm: Presentation8:30 - 10:00pm: Networking • What to bring • Important to know
events.location: Harry's Bar @ Boat Quay (Proceed to Top Floor), 28 Boat Quay,, Singapore

events.name: Fireside Chat on Renewable Energy
events.description: Let's get together and hear from industry expert, Jayantika Soni, Co-founder & CTO of RESync Technologies, all about her experience and about renewable energies. Agenda:6:30pm Registration & Food7:00pm Introductions7:10pm Fireside Chat with Jayantika7:40pm Speaker from Singapore Power (TBD)8:10pm Networking8:30pm Wrap up This speaker and panel event is open to everyone who is there to inspire women to excel in tech careers. All members are required to abide by the Women Who Code Code of Conduct - https://www.womenwhocode.com/blog/code-of-conduct
events.location: SP Digital, 240, Tanjong Pagar Road, #08-00 Keppel Tower 2, (S) 088540, Singapore

events.name: PyData Meetup April 2018
events.description: Agenda • 6:45pm - 7:00pm Networking • 7:00pm - 8:15pm Presentation: Visualizing Data With Bokeh by Paul Lorett Amazona Title: Visualizing Data With Bokeh Synopsis:Bokeh is an interactive visualization library that targets modern web browsers for presentation.Paul has been using Bokeh this year at work and in his personal projects.He'll be sharing his experience/approaches in using the library. . Bokeh basics. Working with streamed data Bio:Paul is a developer working in an investment bank.Outside work, he's involved in: . serving as core volunteer with DataKind Singapore helping to organize events and engage volunteers in using data science with non-profit organizations.. speaking in .NET/Azure and Python tech communities.. volunteering as a music facilitator in a monthly ukulele meetup. Updates Join us on Facebook and Twitter https://www.facebook.com/groups/pydatasg/https://www.twitter.com/pydatasg Sponsors   Group Sponsor
events.location: Microsoft Singapore Auditorium, Level 21, One Marina Boulevard

events.name: Introduction to Web Design (R2)
events.description:
Introduction to Web Design (R2)
This is a free introductory course to those who are exploring stepping into this industry, picking up web design skills, or creating their own websites.
Course Criteria
If you are...

an aspiring web designer/developer?
a business owner looking to create your own budget website?
looking to sell things online through your own website?
interested to join the web industry?
exploring web design courses to sign up for, but not sure if you're ready for it?

If you fall into any of the above categories, this introductory session is for you!

Course Outline

What is a website? What is web design?
What makes up a website? What are the basic elements in a web template?
What makes up a website? What goes on behind the scenes?
How will UI, UX & SEO affect web design?
What are the various ways of creating a website and the costs/resources involved?


Course Format
Each class has a maximum of 10 people, and group discussions are frequently held throughout the session. This course is an introductory session, so no laptops are required, although recommended.

Course Fee
This is a free introductory session. At no point before, during or after this course will we collect a fee for your participation in this course. Light snacks and drinks will be provided. All participants will also be granted a one-time 10% discount for all of Oangle's services or courses available.

Other notes:
This course will start and end on time. Please notify Oangle if you are unable to make it. This class will only go ahead if there are at least 4 participants. You will be notified in case of cancellation by 4PM on the day of the course.
